flawed_nl_solution:
Since Audrey is older than Heracles by 7 years, in 3 years he will be 13 years older than Heracles' current age
In 3 years he will be double Heracles' current age 13 * 2 = <<13*2=26>>26
Heracles is <<13=13>>13
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
